mapper.insert: insert into sensor_inclination (id, sensor_id, angle_x, angle_y, angle_total, direct_angle, angle_init_total, direct_angle_init, temperature, create_time, version) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sensorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{angleX,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{angleY,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{angleTotal,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{directAngle,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{angleInitTotal,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{directAngleInit,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{temperature,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update sensor_inclination
sensor_id = #{sensorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
angle_x = #{angleX,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
angle_y = #{angleY,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
angle_total = #{angleTotal,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
direct_angle = #{directAngle,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
angle_init_total = #{angleInitTotal,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
direct_angle_init = #{directAngleInit,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
temperature = #{temperature,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sensor_inclination set sensor_id = #{sensorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, angle_x = #{angleX,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, angle_y = #{angleY,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, angle_total = #{angleTotal,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, direct_angle = #{directAngle,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, angle_init_total = #{angleInitTotal,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, direct_angle_init = #{directAngleInit,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, temperature = #{temperature,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from sensor_inclination order by id asc

select
from sensor_inclination where id = (select min(id) from sensor_inclination where id > #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT})

select
from sensor_inclination where id = (select max(id) from sensor_inclination)

select
from sensor_inclination where angle_total =( select max(angle_total) from sensor_inclination
where id <=#{endId}
and id >=#{startId}) order by id desc limit 1

select max(id) from sensor_inclination where
create_time <=#{lastTime}
